description: The move is part of social distancing measures to slow the spread of coronavirus.
title: Coronavirus: Pubs asked to close by Irish government
title_page: Coronavirus: Pubs asked to close by Irish government - BBC News
maintext: On Sunday, the Irish government said having consulted with the chief medical officer, it was an "essential public health measure given the reports of reckless behaviour by some members of the public in certain pubs last night".
